timeline.message: Make Table constrcut its own columns

timeline.bodyText: We need to remove all concept of Class<?> with the QueryEngine and metadata classes so that Fili can leverage this as well.
timeline.author: aklish

timeline.bodyText: Same comment - we need to use table names - not classes for mapping.
timeline.author: aklish
aklish

timeline.bodyText: Should the override methods return the base type?  Like Metric here?
timeline.author: aklish

timeline.bodyText: We should provide a bean that allows users to override the QueryEngine bean that is used.
timeline.author: aklish
